ground_truth.note: Sinapism/Synapismos refers to a medicinal preparation, typically a poultice or plaster made from mustard seeds, used to stimulate blood flow and draw out humors.

The exact nature of 'anatricela' or 'anatron' is unclear. It is described as a 'register or roll' and given a specific name by Nicolao Lemero, suggesting a specific instrument or document. The link to a register/roll is speculative.
